successes.title: Swiftpoint GT: World's 1st Mouse with Natural Touch Gestures
successes.description: A portable powerhouse unleashing the power of touch in Windows 7, 8 and 10. Great for Mac, Android and even iPad.

Pledges.description: *** Early Bird Special *** One Swiftpoint GT device in full retail packaging with all accessories included (travel case, USB receiver, palm-rest mat, folding mouse mat, parking spot, screen cleaning cloth). Save $52  off the retail launch price.
Free shipping in US and NZ, add $7 for other countries.
